subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Venus Williams rallied from a set down to beat Ana Ivanovic, 4-6, 6-3, 6-4, to advance to the final of the Zurich Open. She will face Flavia Pennetta, who defeated Anabel Medina Garrigues, 6-3, 7-6 (6), in the other semifinal. Pennetta is 3-1 against Williams and beat her in the first round in last week’s Ladies Kremlin Cup in Moscow.
